title: Google have worst security.my phone had been lost in Oct 2018.and my id deleted from find my phone a
content:
Google have worst security ever i faced.my phone had been lost in October 2018 nd google told me they have best security feature..i was trying to find it through find my phone.. but after a month my id from find my phone was wipe out automatically or deleted. How is this possible.. my phone is also password protected
.. and also now they are not abke to find pixel2xl... Worst service ever given by google... iPhone is much better than that
